trans-unit.source: DocumentBox Integration in Microsoft Dynamics NAV Pages

seg-source.mrk: DocumentBox Integration in Microsoft Dynamics NAV Pages

trans-unit.source: The integration of cc|dms into Microsoft Dynamics NAV is based on a FactBox as SubPage named “DocumentBox”, linked to page 5306027 (DMS - Doc. Box FactBox Async). The FactBox contains the client add-in and the user should have rights to open (execute) this page.

seg-source.mrk: The integration of cc|dms into Microsoft Dynamics NAV is based on a FactBox as SubPage named “DocumentBox”, linked to page 5306027 (DMS - Doc.
Box FactBox Async).
The FactBox contains the client add-in and the user should have rights to open (execute) this page.

trans-unit.source: : DocumentBox Client Add-in on Sales Order Card

seg-source.mrk: : DocumentBox Client Add-in on Sales Order Card

trans-unit.source: The parent PageType should be “Card”, “List” or any similar type. Since the integration is a FactBox, the DocumentBox does not work on ListPart or any included (sub-) pages.

seg-source.mrk: The parent PageType should be “Card”, “List” or any similar type.
Since the integration is a FactBox, the DocumentBox does not work on ListPart or any included (sub-) pages.
: Implementation DocumentBox as FactBox

trans-unit.source: It is necessary to pass a record to obtain all documents, regarding the record. It is the best way to create a function on the page with the name “UpdateDocumentBox()”, which is called from the Trigger “OnAfterGetCurrRecord()”.

seg-source.mrk: It is necessary to pass a record to obtain all documents, regarding the record.
It is the best way to create a function on the page with the name “UpdateDocumentBox()”, which is called from the Trigger “OnAfterGetCurrRecord()”.

trans-unit.source: : Implementation Source Code to Update DocumentBox

seg-source.mrk: : Implementation Source Code to Update DocumentBox

trans-unit.source: The DocumentBox provides the “CurrPage.DocumentBox.PAGE.SetRecordRef()” function to pass the record as RecordReference and returns “TRUE” if the client add-in's document list needs to be updated. The “CurrPage.DocumentBox.PAGE.UpdateDocumentBox()” function will obtain all SharePoint documents and display them in the DocumentBox.

seg-source.mrk: The DocumentBox provides the “CurrPage.DocumentBox.PAGE.SetRecordRef()” function to pass the record as RecordReference and returns “TRUE” if the client add-in's document list needs to be updated.
The “CurrPage.DocumentBox.PAGE.UpdateDocumentBox()” function will obtain all SharePoint documents and display them in the DocumentBox.

trans-unit.source: : Implementation Source Code to Update DocumentBox

seg-source.mrk: : Implementation Source Code to Update DocumentBox

trans-unit.source: This source code will load and update all documents regarding the configuration, while opening the card and changing the record.

seg-source.mrk: This source code will load and update all documents regarding the configuration, while opening the card and changing the record.

trans-unit.source: To print and upload a report, an additional implementation for the printing action is necessary. If it is a standard document, printed by Codeunit 229 and based on the Report Selection table, execute the “Upload[...]” function (e.g. “UploadSalesHeader()”). Otherwise check for an “Upload[...]” function in the Table object or copy and customize the content of the “ProcessPDFAndUpload()” function from Codeunit 229. Update the DocumentBox after executing the upload.

seg-source.mrk: To print and upload a report, an additional implementation for the printing action is necessary.
If it is a standard document, printed by Codeunit 229 and based on the Report Selection table, execute the “Upload[...]” function (e.g. “UploadSalesHeader()”).
Otherwise check for an “Upload[...]” function in the Table object or copy and customize the content of the “ProcessPDFAndUpload()” function from Codeunit 229.
Update the DocumentBox after executing the upload.
: Implementation PDF and Upload action
